name: NextLock
0:
”Alexa, unlock the front door.”
”Alexa, lock my door.”
”Alexa, lock door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1 Gateway- sold separately
2. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Turn on the "Remote Unlock" feature in lock's the setting menu.

2. Add gateway with app and make sure you are able to do Remote Unlock via gateway in app.

3. Find the "NextLock" skill in Alexa and login with NextLock account and password. Don't forget the country code if it is your phone number.

4. Once Alexa discovers your locks, you can talk to it as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the "front door"
(front door is the name of the lock,you can rename it in NextLock app)
Alexa, unlock the "front door"
(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app, and setup a voice code)

Notice: The status of some early locks may not correct. The default status will be locked.
